custom_domains.description: Expose the contents of this R2 bucket to the internet through a custom domain. Recommended for production use.
custom_domains.status: There is no custom domain assigned to this bucket.

public_development_url.description: Expose the contents of this R2 bucket to the internet through the Public Development URL when enabled.
public_development_url.status: The public development URL is disabled for this bucket.

r2_data_catalog.description: Add an Apache Iceberg REST catalog, to allow query engines to manage and query Iceberg tables stored in R2.
r2_data_catalog.status: The R2 Data Catalog is disabled for this bucket.

cors_policy.description: Configure CORS headers that R2 will set when accessing this bucket's contents from a browser.
cors_policy.status: There is no CORS Policy defined for this bucket.

event_notifications.description: Automatically trigger Workers and take action when data in your R2 bucket changes by using Cloudflare Queues.
event_notifications.requirements: Using event notifications requires you to purchase a Workers Paid plan.

on_demand_migration.description: Continuously migrate data from an Amazon S3 and Google Cloud bucket to this bucket only as read requests are made.
on_demand_migration.status: On Demand Migration is not enabled for this bucket.

object_lifecycle_rules.description: Specify rules to automatically manage objects after a specified time.

bucket_lock_rules.description: Set a retention policy to prevent object overwrites and deletions until the specified period ends.
bucket_lock_rules.status: There are no bucket lock rules defined for this bucket.

default_storage_class.description: Specify which storage class new objects will automatically be placed in.

usage_notes.recommended_for: Production backup storage with high durability
